ja481:3.2: Kareyya saṃ → kareyyāsaṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); kareyya sa (mr); bhareyya saṃ (?) | kāḷikāyaṃ → kālikāya (sya1ed, sya2ed); kālikāyaṃ (pts-vp-pli1); kāḷikāya (mr)
ja481:4.1: yujjhamānānamayujjhamāno → yujjhamānānaṃ ayujjhamāno (sya1ed, sya2ed); yujjhamānena ayujjhamāno (mr)
ja481:6.3: galakāvakantaṃ → galakaṃ vikantā (sya1ed, sya2ed); galayā vikantuṃ (mr)
ja481:7.2: atthavasaṃ gatā me → atthavasāhatā ime (bj); atthavasābhatā ime (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:7.4: Ekaṃ punappātarāse → ekañca puna pātarāse (bj); ekañca naṃ pātarāse (pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:10.3: Tvaṃ nāthosi → tvaṃ-nātho'smi (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:10.4: nāthohaṃ bhariyāya me → amha-nāthā mama bhariyā (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); nāthohaṃ bhariyāya ca (pts-vp-pli1)
ja481:12.1: paricitto aticitto → paracittena acitto (bj); paracittena aticitto (sya1ed, sya2ed); paracitto acitto (pts-vp-pli1)
